p.d: Kathy, a secretive and rebellious teenager, has only one idea in mind: to get away from the psychiatric facility where she has been interned. But when her roommates, Nabila and Carole, decide to join her improvised escape, nothing goes to plan! Directed by: Virginie Gourmel (Belgium, 2018) Cast: Lisa Viance (Kathy), Yamina Zaghouani (Nabila), Noa Pellizari (Carole), Alessandro Mancuso (Noah) Genre: comedy drama
